settings.tag: Looking for a way to detox?
settings.title: Reset, Renew & Rejuvenate

settings.html:
Take 5-days to make your health goals a priority!

If you’re ready for a much-needed reset to lose weight gained during the past few months, then the ProLon® Fasting Mimicking Diet can definitely help.

settings.title: Detox diets claim to benefit the body by:
settings.description:
• Promoting toxin elimination
  • Resting your organs by fasting
  • Supplying healthy nutrients


Many people also report feeling more energetic and focused during and shortly after a detox program. The reason is likely attributable to the elimination of highly processed foods that have added sugar and solid fats.

Try ProLon now

settings.title: Cellular Clean-up
settings.description: ProLon supports the body’s natural process of cellular clean-up, triggered when it’s in a prolonged fasting state.

settings.title: Fat Focused Weight Loss
settings.description: Kickstart weight loss (on average 5 pounds), especially belly fat, while protecting lean body mass.

settings.title: Enhance Clarity
settings.description: Customers report feeling greater focus and clarity toward the end and after completing the fast.

settings.title: More Energy
settings.description: The majority of ProLon users surveyed said they had more energy after completing the fast.

settings.title:
Reset, Renew and Rejuvenate to Help Your Body Detox.

If you’re ready for a much-needed reset to support your body’s natural detoxification process, then ProLon’s Fasting Mimicking Diet® can definitely help.
Transform From Within
settings.description:
ProLon is the 5-Day fasting nutrition program designed to nourish your body & mind while providing fasting benefits.
Add more life to your life and thrive beyond the limits of aging! See your the journey your body is on over 5 days.

settings.title: I can’t recommend ProLon enough
settings.details:
I discovered ProLon last January and I have been doing it consistently ever since then. It is a really great reset for your body, especially 
after holidays. It has so many different benefits, it curbs sugar cravings and helps me manage
portion control.
settings.name: -WHITNEY

settings.title: Go ProLon... I'm obsessed!
settings.details: I started ProLon and i'm telling you, it worked! I lost 6 pounds, I have no brain fog, I absolutely do not crave sugar right now which is insane and I actually feel amazing, I'm full of energy! I am so proud of myself, my husband did it with me, he lost 5 pounds, says he has never felt better.
settings.name: -CAROLINE

settings.title: No more belly bloat...
settings.details: How are you going to feel after 5 days... Amazing! No belly bloat, you are going to lose weight, have more energy, and all your cravings for sugar... GONE! You have to give this a try.
settings.name: -AUDREY

settings.title: Reasons why I love ProLon..
settings.details: ProLon resets my gut (especially when I’ve been traveling), it helps me sleep better, and it allows me to take a break. These are three of the reasons why I love ProLon. I’ve done it for over four years and I only talk about things that I love.
settings.name: -TINX

settings.html:
You may not realize it but you’re already fasting.

Every night when you go to sleep, your body goes into a fasting state. The human body was designed to fast but modern life intervened. Tap into your natural instincts with ProLon.
